meanings.definition: Mayst: archaic second person singular form of 'may'
meanings.sent1: You mayst go to the park.
meanings.sent2: She mayst read a book after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat mayst chase its tail all day long.
meanings.sent4: The wind mayst whisper secrets to the trees.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the birds mayst sing melodies at dawn.

meanings.definition: Mayst: used to express permission or possibility
meanings.sent1: May I mayst have some more cookies, please?
meanings.sent2: You mayst find a hidden treasure in the old chest.
meanings.sent3: If you finish your homework, you mayst watch a movie.
meanings.sent4: The stars mayst align for your dreams to come true.
meanings.sent5: With hard work, you mayst achieve anything you desire.
